example_sentence_english: I must apologize for my delay.

notes: same form as formal imperative and present subjunctive

example_sentence_english: They excuse those who make mistakes.

translation_english: he was excusing/she was excusing/you (formal) were excusing

example_sentence_english: We were often excusing these mistakes.

translation_english: he has excused/she has excused/you (formal) have excused
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'
polite/formal imperative; same form as present subjunctive
example_sentence_english: Excuse me, where is the bathroom?
